content.text: I keep up with my family by making time for them each week, whether it's a phone call, a visit, or sending a care package.
I am close to my family as well. I am fortunate to have a job that allows me to be there for them.
That's great! I like spending time with my family too.
I am a family-oriented person who likes to drive a minivan because it is roomy and comfortable.
I do my laundry once a week, because that is enough to keep my clothes clean and fresh.
I have a bicycle. It's great for getting around town.
I remember the warmth of the other orphans when we huddled together for warmth at night.
I am bisexual. I am attracted to both men and women.
I am shy, so I have a hard time meeting new people. I often panick and don't show up.
I watch a lot of TV. I love to binge-watch my favorite shows.
I am fortunate to have a job that I love. I am a web developer.
I am also fortunate to have a job that I love. I am a teacher.
I like to stay active, so I go for walks every day. I also like to play sports.
I like to stay active too. I like to go for bike rides and play soccer.
I like to read books. I read mostly fiction. I love to get lost in a good story.
I like to read books too. I read mostly nonfiction. I like to learn new things.
I am glad we had this conversation. I enjoyed learning more about you.
I am glad we had this conversation too. I enjoyed learning more about you as well.
